post.body: Ugh. Don't remind me. Never want to see another #cotton bowl after seeing 2 tech losses in the last 4 years.
"I really wanna be overrated" - Quiet Riot
Bob, the nutjob making "Bob's Game," could learn a thing or two from these guys.
because they love to play with our emotions apparently. And how do we give up 47 to ole effing miss?? At least ou we knew about
I guess I agree - slow death is much worse than defeat in a flash in this case. At least we knew our fate quickly then.
the problem is that they don't have an NCAA package at all...fsn maybe, but the experience doesn't seem to carry over
And another losing #Cotton Bowl comes to a merciful end. At least this one was a square beating, not a loss on the worst kick ever like 2005
Damn it, why couldn't we have just gone to the Alamo Bowl? We'd have pounded Northwestern into the damn ground.
And hooray, we can't grab the onside kick. Game Over. :( #Cotton Bowl
This has got to be a record - twice having 2 unsportsmanlike penalties in a season so we kickoff from the 7.5 yard line
My sister is housesitting for one of my dad's coworkers - he has no TV, the internet doesn't work, DVDs won't work - it's like being in hell
Yay. A meaningless touchdown. Yet another crappy #Cotton Bowl for Texas Tech
The #Cotton Bowl has sucked, but at least I got to get some Pizza Mias from Pizza Hut - those are the greatest pizzas evar.
How the hell could we let him catch that??
Btw, props for @attcottonbowl for great use of twitter in a semi-business capcity. Great work guys.
That return was exactly the kind of thing we didn't need of we're gonna come back :( #cotton bowl
Safety? Given the situation that's not much better than a td
Enabling numeric battery on my itouch shows just what a schizophrenic bitch the battery is.
Cmon defense, we NEED to stop them here. That big run doesn't help
Just realized - if we lose, this makes us like Cal when we beat them. #cotton bowl
